description: Try our easy to follow Passionfruit & Pineapple Spritzer recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mocktail,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pineapple,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,High fibre,Low kilojoule,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Passionfruit & Pineapple Spritzer Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 passionfruit, pulp removed, strained (plus extra to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut half the pineapple into 2cm sticks and place into a bowl. Freeze for 4 hours or until frozen.
Roughly chop remaining pineapple and process in a food processor until finely chopped. Transfer to a large jug. Add strained passionfruit and pineapple juice.
Add ice and mineral water. Serve spritzer in tall glasses. Add mint sprigs, sliced extra passionfruit and frozen pineapple for stirring.
